welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Horsholm, Denmark! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Horsholm has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Kastrup Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 3 hours per device, additional time can be purchased.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
